tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went for an arthroscopic rotator cuff surgery for my father last month on 9th July. Dr K K Subbaiah Sir is very friendly and understands the patients problem very carefully and explain the problem with deep understanding and helps you in giving genuine suggestions. We are still in touch with him for further improvement and he has been always there to suggest after surgery as well. My father is  in improving phase and on medication after surgery suggested by Sir and we are in touch with him and getting the treatment done by sir. Looking forward to full recovery for my father and will try to write the review as well after 3 months. Staff in the hospital is also very friendly and cooperative.
Doctor explained me the issue in detail and diagnosed very well. Didn't give unnecessary test or scan. Answered all my questions with patience.

Very friendly *** ************* *******  Provided precise explanation of the diagonosis and made us comfortable. Went in for my kid's complain about ankle pain. Took only 10 min wait time. Staff was friendly as well. Keep it up!
Got a gym injury of shoulder muscle. Doctor is friendly and practical. He gave exercises and muscle relaxers. ** *********** ****** Let’s hope the recovery is sooner.
The doctor's suggestion was good but I had to wait for almost 2 hours to see the doctor so this 15-minute max wait was not right

Doctor is very good with his explanation as to whether I need any surgery or physiotherapy or any treatment. I even asked if I need any physiotherapy for which he only gave the exercises. Very patient and humble.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. K. K. Subbiah is a truly exceptional *** ****** ******* doctor, and my family and I are immensely grateful for his expertise and care. Today, our daughter experienced a wrist bone fracture during her skating class, which led us to seek medical attention at Sunshine Hospital Horamavu. At that facility, it was confirmed that our daughter had indeed suffered a fracture, and the medical team recommended surgery as the solution.

During this challenging time, a close friend from our circle recommended Dr. K. K. Subbiah, and we are profoundly thankful for that suggestion. After assessing the X-ray, Dr. Subbiah determined that surgery was not necessary. Instead, he proposed a less invasive approach, which involved manually realigning the bone and ensuring it was properly positioned. This procedure would be painful for our child, but the doctor assured us that she could endure it without the need for anesthesia.

Dr. Subbiah's hands-on approach, extensive experience, and deep understanding of the root causes of medical issues were immediately evident. He explained the situation with utmost clarity, making what initially seemed like a complex problem appear surprisingly straightforward. 

Our heartfelt thanks go out to Dr. Subbiah for resolving our daughter's medical issue in just 15 minutes.

Very experienced and jovial knows the job 
Went for consultation  and it was a good experience.
Helps you understand and builds confidence in you.

He spoke in a very condescending manner and seemed to dismiss the pain as something very common. If it were common wouldnt everyone be in pain constantly.  Just gave painkillers ans stretching exercises.
Doctor was very friendly and explained the problem well. Wait time was 30 mins in spite of booking appointment since doctor was in OT.

review: Very rare you come across doctors who assures you that you will be taken care of despite your health issues. He explained the problems and also recommended us the treatment in simplest manner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Subbhaiah doctor is one of the amazing doctor I met in recent times, very friendly and upto the point, no unwanted tests or medications. Glad we still have such doctors around.
Doctor was very gentle and helped diagnose the exact issue . It was so good an experience that the doctor heard all of our issues and then gave a solution

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He is one among rare doctors… did not suggest for unnecessary scans n X-rays… was very clear focusing at the root cause… gave simple home remedy fix *** *** *** *** ** *********** ****** these days it’s very hard to find such doctors who don’t work just for “money”. He spent 15-20 min explaining us the issue and solution but didn’t even charge consultation…

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: My mom visited Dr.Subbaiah after getting good reviews from someone, but we were disappointed with his treatment as he not only didn't take her servere excruciating pain seriously, but also did not prescribe any treatment* ******* ********** ****** ** ****** ** ********* ***** *** * **** ** ******** ***** Safe to say I'm definitely not going back there.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He most importantly makes you so comfortable and explains why any thing has to be done , avoids unnecessary MRI n X-rays, most most importantly again is there for you for any queries post the problem is treated !!!!
Very gud....very nice doctor ...wud like to recommend him fr any orthopaedic problem..very gud hospital

Sir  is the doctor I recommend. No X ray, no MRI. Solved the problem by just pulling the knee back to position. Just 5 minutes and recommend me some exercises. Another time I visited for frozen shoulder, he suggested only exercises. The pain vanished. Very friendly and courteous. Though I have shifted from Thanisandra, I
 still visit him for any orthopaedic problems. Thanks to the doctor a million times.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: He is a great doctor 🙂very patiently he listened n tackeled the patient .we are happy with the doctors treatment .Thankyou Sir
